text: "Burgers and Fries" is a 1978 song by Charley Pride and is the second single from his 25th studio album Burgers and Fries/When I Stop Leaving (I'll Be Gone). It went to number 2 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs and number 1 on the Canadian RPM Country Tracks charts. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1980. ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:Country songs Category:Charley Pride songs
title: Burgers and Fries
